description: Calculates slope and aspect of elevation map.

parameters.description: Type of output aspect and slope maps. Storage type for resultant raster map.  [generated from r.slope.aspect_precision]
parameters.name: datatype

parameters.description: Name for output slope raster map.  [generated from r.slope.aspect_slope]
parameters.name: name_of_output_slope

parameters.description: Name for output aspect raster map.  [generated from r.slope.aspect_aspect]
parameters.name: name_of_output_aspect

returns.description: Exported result from exporter r.slope.aspect aspect parameter
returns.name: {{ name_of_output_aspect }}

returns.description: Exported result from exporter exporter raster parameter
returns.name: {{ name_of_output_slope }}
